title: Interpretation of seeing cockroaches in a dream

preview.html: Interpretation of seeing cockroaches in a dream or a dream through the site of seeing cockroaches in a dream are not desirable and indicate damage and damage to the fortuneteller, magic and envy. They also indicate many problems and disputes and we will explain them in detail. Interpretation of seeing cockroaches in a dream for married and pregnant women in a dream for a married man, an unmarried young man, and an unmarried and married girl. And a pregnant woman, as well as a divorced woman and a widow, through providing interpretations by major commentators such as Imam Muhammad bin Sirin. , for “This is with us on the vision website. What is the interpretation of seeing cockroaches in a dream according to Ibn Sirin: Seeing a lot of cockroaches in a dream braiding many enemies around the dreamer. Seeing cockroaches in a dream indicates many marital and family problems. Seeing large cockroaches in a dream indicates The experiences and tribulations of the dreamer. Seeing cockroaches eating in a dream indicates a great ordeal that the dreamer will fall into or a serious illness. What is the interpretation of seeing cockroaches in a dream for a single woman: If an unmarried woman sees a lot of cockroaches, it indicates the presence of people in her life who are harming her. Cockroaches dream about women Single women, it indicates the envy and hatred of some people, and it may be an indication of magic. If a girl sees black cockroaches, it indicates the presence of someone who is forcing her to commit immorality and sins. What is the interpretation of seeing cockroaches in a dream for a married woman: If a married woman sees cockroaches in her house, it indicates many marital problems and disputes. If a married woman sees herself in a dream killing cockroaches, it indicates freedom from problems and the end of worry and anxiety. What is the interpretation of seeing cockroaches in a dream for a pregnant woman: If a pregnant woman sees a lot of cockroaches in a dream, it indicates a failed birth and problems in her life. A dream about dead cockroaches for a woman A pregnant woman says that she passed the pregnancy and childbirth period safely. If a pregnant woman sees a large cockroach, this indicates her suffering during pregnancy and childbirth and the presence of envy in her life. Seeing a cockroach being killed in a pregnant woman’s dream indicates that problems will be solved and she will give birth to a healthy child and give birth to a healthy child. What is the interpretation of seeing cockroaches? In a divorced dream: Seeing cockroaches in a divorced dream indicates many problems and issues in her life. Seeing a cockroach pilot in a dream for a divorced woman indicates enemies in her life who do not wish her well. Seeing dead cockroaches on the bed in a divorced dream indicates the end of problems, worries and joy after Sadness. What is the interpretation of a dream about cockroaches in the bathroom: If someone sees cockroaches in the bathroom, it shows the many problems that surround him, but he will overcome them. Seeing cockroaches on the body or head shows that this person has magic. Seeing flying cockroaches indicates the many problems that the viewer faces. What is the interpretation of seeing cockroaches Eat? Eating cockroaches denotes a villain who is misplanning the monarch. Seeing cockroaches denotes committing sins, transgressions, negativity and indifference. Seeing cockroaches eating indicates the presence of problems and the severity of the disease. Seeing cockroaches in a dream shows harm and abuse to pedestrians.

title: Interpretation of seeing urinating in a grave in a dream

preview.html: What is the interpretation of urinating on a grave? An explanation of the dead person’s need for prayers. What is the meaning of seeing an unmarried woman urinating on her father’s grave? Evidence of her longing for her father. What is the interpretation of seeing an unmarried woman urinating on a plant? A sign of happiness and family bonding. What does it mean to see? A man who urinates on crops? A sign of hearing good news. What is the interpretation of seeing the dreamer urinating in the sea? A sign of charity for all those in need. What is the purpose of the vision of urinating on bread? An indication of the death of harm and harm. What is the interpretation of seeing a married woman urinating in the bathroom? An indication of Giving birth to huge male offspring. Interpretation of seeing urinating in a grave in a dream: If the dreamer sees that he is urinating on the grave of a dead person he knows, this indicates that he has committed many sins. Ibn Shirin pointed out that seeing urine on a grave in a dream is an indication of the dead person’s need to pray. While seeing urinating on a grave The grave of a well-known dead person symbolizes the obligation to pay charity to the dead person. When an unmarried girl sees herself urinating on her father’s grave, this is evidence of her longing for her father. But if someone is seen urinating on the grave of a dead person, this is a sign of a financial crisis. Whoever sees in a dream that he is urinating on The grave of a dead person, this indicates his distance from his Lord. Interpretation of the appearance of urine by Ibn SirinInterpretation by Ibn Sirin: Seeing a person urinating in a dream, this is a sign that he is losing control of himself and his actions, and this is what requires reviewing his actions. Seeing urination in a dream can be a good sign and you will get He will obtain a lot of money in the future. Whoever sees in a dream that someone is urinating on him, this indicates that this person will provide him with assistance. Whoever sees in a dream that urine is spread everywhere, this indicates the dreamer’s fears about the future and the loss of money or a certain status. In general, seeing urine in a dream indicates a lot of money and good luck. Interpretation of urinating on clothes by Ibn Sirin Ibn Sirin explained that whoever sees himself urinating on his clothes, or urinating on himself in front of him, this indicates the many problems he suffers from that require him to take action. Wisely and resolved, it may indicate wasting money elsewhere. It may indicate the need to take care of his health. Interpretation of dreams about urinating on plants: If an unmarried girl sees herself urinating on plants, this is a sign of happiness and family cohesion. While a married woman’s dream of urinating on plants symbolizes the arrival of kindness and adequate nutrition. But if a man sees that he is the person who urinates On the plant is a sign that you are hearing the good news. When a single young man sees that he is urinating in the planter, this is a sign that he will get a promotion. Urinating on plants in front of people in a divorced woman’s dream is evidence that her wedding is approaching. This vision in a married man’s dream can also indicate qualities Good for a man. Interpretation of a dream of urinating in a bowl of food. If the dreamer sees that he is urinating on a plate of food in a dream, this indicates the arrival of goodness and nourishment. But if the sleeper sees himself urinating on bread in a dream, this indicates the death of harm and harm. Seeing urine in the kitchen also indicates hearing The good news has come

title: Interpretation of a dream about a bucket falling into a well in a dream

preview.html: Interpretation of dreams about a bucket falling into a well in a dream. We may want to know the interpretation of a dream about a bucket falling into a well in a dream. It is one of the dreams that some people see, but there are many interpretations provided by the site. It clarifies citing the interpretations of some scholarly workers who seek to reach the truth. Interpretation of a dream about a bucket falling In a well in a dream: A bucket falling into a well in a dream may indicate bad financial conditions during those days. Whoever sees in his dream that there is an empty bucket and it fell into the well, it may indicate some disturbances that occurred in the dreamer’s life at that time. Anyone who sees in a well in a dream may indicate some disturbances that occurred in the dreamer’s life at that time. His dream that the bucket fell into the well and was empty could indicate a problem that the dreamer may be suffering from at that time and he must ask God for help. Interpretation of a dream about a neighbor’s building collapsing in a dream: If you see the neighbor’s building collapsing, this may indicate a crisis that the neighbors may be exposed to during this Time, and God knows best. We find that the collapse of a neighbor’s building in a dream could indicate some problems and crises that this family is suffering from, and God knows best. In the event that one sees his neighbors’ house falling from it, the walls may indicate a financial crisis that the neighbors may be exposed to during this period. The collapse of a neighbor’s house in a dream may indicate the coming of sorrows for the owners of the house, and God knows best. Interpretation of a dream of oil falling on the ground in a dream: In the event that you see oil falling on the ground, this may indicate what comes after the disturbances that occurred in the life of the dreamer during those days. From Dreaming of oil falling to the ground may indicate that he was going through a financial crisis at that time, and God knows best. Seeing oil falling to the ground may indicate financial disturbances and crises that the dreamer may suffer from in those days. A person’s dream that oil has fallen to the ground may indicate changes. His life took a turn for the worse. He should ask God for help. Interpretation of a dream about a body falling from the sky in a dream: If one sees that his body has fallen from the sky, this may indicate a problem that the dreamer fell into during this period, and God knows best. His body falling from the sky may indicate a disaster and troubles that may occur. The dreamer suffers from it on those days. In the event that one sees a body falling from the sky, this may indicate pollution and competition that occurred to the visions during this time. In the event that one sees that there is a body falling from the sky, this may indicate that some disturbances have occurred in the dreamer’s life in Those days, and God knows best. Interpretation of a dream of an old house falling in a dream: In the event that my personal opinion is that an old house has fallen and collapsed, this may indicate some problems and fears that the dreamer is suffering from in his life and that they will soon end. An old house falling in a dream may indicate the end of a period Difficult for the dreamer. A person’s dream of an old house collapsing may indicate some disturbances that occurred in his life during those days. It is possible that seeing an old house collapsing in a dream indicates abandonment of obedience and disobedience, and the dreamer must repent and approach God Almighty. Interpretation of a dream about hair loss in In a dream, seeing scales on the hair may indicate a financial loss that the owner of the dream may suffer

title: Interpretation of hugging the dead in a dream, crying and hugging the dead, complete correct interpretations

preview.html: In the article below, we explain what is the interpretation of hugging a dead person in a dream and crying and embracing a dead person in a dream in all cases, according to Ibn Sirin, Ibn Shaheen, Al-Nabulsi, and Imam Al-Sadiq. It heralds the coming of good, so he turns to lawyers and interpreters to interpret his vision. It is worth noting that this vision varies depending on the condition of the dead whom the dreamer saw in his dream, and varies according to the social status of the sleeping person. For this reason, we will show you the interpretation of hugging the deceased in a dream, and this is what we will present to you in this article. A dream about the deceased is one of the common visions that come to mind, especially for those who lost him. . Loved ones, whether from the family such as father or mother, whether from relatives or friends. Some people sometimes believe that the meaning of this vision lies in the extent to which the dreamer longs to see her and misses her. But this vision has many different meanings for the dreamer and the deceased together depending on the situation. There are dreams in which the deceased appears happy, sad, angry, crying, giving him something, or advising him something. Certain, but what about vision? Dead in your arms in a dream? We will show you this through an encyclopedia where you can see the interpretations of the leading dream interpreters about this vision. Interpretation of hugging the dead in a dream and crying. Dream interpretation scholars say that seeing crying and embracing the dead in a dream means that the dreamer will leave someone he loves. Seeing Alet hugging and kissing him in a dream indicates loss. Which the dreamer will suffer in the coming days. If a man sees in his dream that he is hugging the dead and crying, but he cries without crying, then this is a good vision that portends the death of the worries and problems that he suffers from. Embracing the dead and screaming in a dream are unpleasant visions, indicating that the dreamer’s misfortune will be In his religion. Interpretation of the chest of a dead person in a dream by Ibn Sirin. Muhammad ibn Sirin says in his book Interpretation of Dreams that if the sleeper sees in his dream that he is hugging the dead person and crying and screaming loudly, then this is a vision that indicates the death of the dreamer in the coming days and only God knows the time. Seeing the dead person being embraced in his arms And he cries without screaming, indicating that the dreamer is committing a lot of sins and disobedience, and this vision warns him of the necessity of repentance and asking for a spoon from our Lord Almighty. Interpretation of the dead in a dream by Ibn Sirin. Ibn Sirin interprets seeing the embrace of the dead in a dream as an indication of the extent of the dreamer’s love for the dead, and an indication of a supplication. The frequent dreamer, giving alms, and the benefit received by the family of the deceased. . Ibn Sirin agreed with other dream interpreters that seeing a dead person hugging in a dream is an indication of the dreamer’s longevity. When you dream that you are hugging a dead person who has a good status and good reputation, this reflects the dreamer’s commitment to obedience and closeness to God. As for the dream of hugging the dead and crying, it is an indication. Bad things happen to the dreamer. If the dreamer sees that he is embracing an unknown dead person, then this is one of the dreams promising abundant sustenance and money. Interpretation of embracing the dead in a dream according to Nabulsi: Imam Nabulsi narrates that if the dreamer sees himself hugging his deceased father in a dream, then this is evidence of his kindness and abundant livelihood. a

title: Interpretation of seeing black tar in Al-Osaimi’s dream

preview.html: Interpretation of seeing a dream about black tar in a dream according to Al-Osaimi. Seeing a black tar in a dream indicates anxiety and sadness. Seeing tar in a dream, and with it, quarrels occur in many different places. Through the top site we explain all the different interpretations of this vision in a dream for men and women. Interpretation of seeing a dream about tar. Black in a dream of Al-OsaimiInterpretation of seeing a dream of black tar in a dream of Al-OsaimiYou can find out the interpretation of this vision as follows: The meaning of eating asphalt in a wife’s dream symbolizes disasters, worries, and marital conflicts, and it was said that it is diseases and pains, and God knows best. The meaning of walking on black tar in a wife’s dream: bad Behavior, wrong decisions, and wrong roads, and God Almighty knows best. The meaning of repairing roads and covering them with asphalt in his wife’s dreams symbolizes changing conditions, the end of tension, and the end of the battles and crises of the people he saw. Interpretation of black bitumen in a dream of a man from the great world. To know the interpretation of this vision, follow the following. The meaning of seeing a dirty black hand in a man’s dream symbolizes receiving money illegally or without rights. The meaning of seeing black tar on the body in a man’s dream symbolizes suffering, illness, difficulties in life, financial difficulties, and exhaustion for whoever sees it, which is what God Almighty knows. The meaning of the black dress Smeared with tar in a man’s dream symbolizes family worries, separation, and fighting, and it is said that it is unemployment, loss of money, and heavy debts, and I know that well, Glory be to Him. Interpretation of a dream about black tar in a girl dreaming of Al-Osaimi. The interpretation of this vision for Al-Osaimi was as follows: Seeing the girl’s dream clothes painted with black tar symbolizes To stress, sadness, and loss of life for the person you are looking at. The meaning of the face being soiled with black tar in a girl’s dreams indicates bad behavior, behavior, and words that speak about the girl and that God Almighty taught her. Seeing clean asphalt in a girl’s dream means good food and money that she gets from what she sees. Interpretation of a dream about a black flower Now learn about the interpretation of this vision according to the following: Sheikh Al-Usaimi explained the meaning of a dream about black tar through a series of interpretations that hardly deserve praise, such as stress, suffering, and illness, and God Almighty knows best. The meaning of black tar coming out of the mouth is the end of recovery from illness, and the end of fatigue. And suffering, and the end of crisis and tension, the most famous of which is the Almighty. The meaning of putting brown tar on the ground and repairing the road symbolizes the arrival of goodness and food, a change in the situation and a better change in the life of the dreamer. To see that you cannot walk on black tar on the road indicates suffering, obstacles and problems. Which the dreamer must go through in life, and God Almighty knows best. Dreaming of paved roads for a single woman. You can learn about these different interpretations of the vision according to the following: Seeing asphalt poured on the road is a sign of success and success in your career. Asphalt simply indicates making money Seeing asphalt in your dreams indicates that you have achieved your goals. Why

title: Interpretation of seeing predatory animals in a dream according to Ibn Sirin: good or bad skin?

preview.html: Interpretation of seeing predatory animals in a dream. ProvidedInterpretation of seeing predatory animals in a dream. Through the following lines that we present to you through the encyclopedia website, seeing predatory animals in a dream is one of the visions that make the dreamer want to know the interpretation of this vision and whether it is a good vision or whether doing it does not bode well. Especially since the interpretation of the vision differs depending on the predatory animal that the fortuneteller saw in the dream, as the meanings of animals refer to the life that a person lives in all the details and to every predatory animal, and likewise domestic animals refer to a specific part of a person’s life. For example, we find wolves symbolizing enemies. Since the interpreters’ interpretation depends on the fortuneteller himself, it is always related to people’s lives, as some see what they cannot see in reality, and you can learn the different interpretations of the most famous dream interpreters such as Ibn Sirin and Ibn Shaheen and their opinion on interpreting the vision of predatory animals for men, women, married people, pregnant women, and single people. By reading the following lines: Predators often refer to enemies, and the distance between the fortuneteller and the animal is the distance between him and his enemies. Predators also refer to the problems and difficulties that a person faces in his life and whether he can overcome them or whether he will continue to run away from them and be afraid to face them. Controlling predatory animals in a dream shows the dreamer’s ability to deal with his problems and get rid of them. Interpretation of seeing predatory animals in a dream by Ibn Sirin. Ibn Shirin’s interpretation of seeing predatory animals in a dream indicates that the dreamer is facing many difficulties and problems in his life and that he cannot escape from these problems while they are chasing them. Ibn Sirin believes that whoever sees predatory animals in a dream indicates enemies and that the dreamer has some enemies who are considered friends. Ibn Sirin also indicated that seeing predatory animals in a dream indicates the proximity of enemies and may be able to defeat the dreamer and win over him. Ibn Sirin indicated that distance Between the fortuneteller and the monsters is the distance between him and his enemies. However, if the dreamer is able to escape and stay away from the animals, this is a sign of his ability to escape from the enemies and get rid of them unharmed and that he can overcome them. Interpretation of seeing predatory animals in a dream according to Al-Nabulsi. Al-Nabulsi will say that animals in a person’s dream are not evidence of The dreamer’s sins, and he must abandon the sins and come closer to God. Al-Nabulsi also believes that when the dreamer sees in his dream that predatory animals are chasing him, this indicates the presence of hypocrites near the dreamer, who show him love, but harbor hatred, malice, and envy. Interpretation of seeing predatory animals in a dream For a married woman: If a married woman sees that there are a large number of predators who want to enter her home, but she was able to stop them and close the door of the house, then this is good news for her, as it indicates that she will be able to do so. to treat

title: A dog bite in a dream for a single woman

preview.html: In the case of a married woman, a pregnant woman, a man, a young man, or a divorced woman, is it a good vision or a promising vision for the monarch? Interpretation of seeing a dog bite in a dream for one girl: One girl seeing in her dream that dogs are raising each other means that there are many enemies in her reality. As for the unmarried girl who saw a white dog In a dream, some of them stood up. The vision means that she has a person with high morals in her life. But if the dog was black in an unmarried girl’s dream and some of them stood up, then the vision indicates the presence of hypocrites in her life. These people are close to her, but they hurt her severely. From his point of view Ibn Sirin considered that dogs in a single girl’s dream are evidence of enemies and deception. Ibn Sirin also explained that an unmarried girl saw a dog, some of which were standing in a dream. This indicates that she will receive betrayal from her lover in the coming days, and most scholars said that the interpretation of this vision is According to the condition of the dreamer. See also: Interpretation of seeing a dog in a dream and its meaning in detail. Interpretation of seeing a dog bite in a dream for a married woman. If a married woman sees a dog, some of them get up in a dream. The vision means that she has a husband who is unjustly stealing her money. When a married woman sees a dog in a dream, some of them get up The vision showed that this woman lives with a corrupt person who has no morals. As for the married woman, she saw a group of dogs, some of whom rose in the dream. The vision indicated the presence of friends, haters, and envious people. There are other interpretations of this vision, such as the married woman seeing a gray dog, and some of them revolted. It means that there is an unfair person in her life. This person could be her husband, brother, or father. A married woman seeing a dog in a dream generally indicates that her husband is cheating on her, so she asks him for a divorce. If a married woman sees a brown dog in her dream, This means that in reality there is a person who hates her and is jealous of her. Ibn Sirin interprets a married woman’s vision of a dog biting each other as a cunning person in the woman’s life. Ibn Sirin also interpreted this vision in a woman’s dream as many sins and misdeeds that the woman has committed in her life. A dog biting a woman A married woman in a dream on her right hand is evidence of one of her sons disobeying her. Interpretation of seeing a dog bite in a dream for a man and its meaning: Seeing a man in a dream is that he buys a dog, then the dog bites him. The vision means that this person is spending his money to no avail. The vision also means that this person is doing business It harms him. When a man sees in his dream that he has been bitten by a dog. From Al-Nabulsi’s point of view, the vision indicates that he will meet a woman with bad morals. He will marry her or love her, and this affects him greatly. Al-Nabulsi also interpreted the dream of a man who saw a dog biting him. The evidence is that this A man will suffer from injustice and harm in his work. When a man has enemies in reality, and he sees that a dog bites him in a dream. The vision indicated that his enemies will actually defeat him. A man who buys a dog in a dream and then takes some of it is evidence of great harm or misfortune befalling the fortuneteller. A vision A man in a dream being bitten by a dog is evidence of betrayal or betrayal by his family or a close friend. Seeing the

title: Interpretation of a dream about perfume for a single woman and interpretation of the smell of perfume in a dream by Ibn Sirin

preview.html: Interpretation of a dream about perfume for single women: Seeing perfume in a dream is one of the promising visions for an unmarried girl. It was interpreted by the scholar Ibn Sirin, Imam Al-Sadiq, Al-Nabulsi and others. Interpretation of a dream about perfume for single women. What is the interpretation of a dream about perfume for a single woman? There are many interpretations and indications for a dream about perfume for an unmarried woman in a dream, and the interpretation This dream varies depending on the social status of the dreamer, and some interpretive scholars believe that the person who sees in the dream that there is the smell of perfume that emanates from him, an indication of the improvement of his life and the increase in his livelihood. When an unmarried woman sees in her dream that someone she does not know offers her a bottle of perfume, this means That she will receive a series of happy news in the coming period and see an unmarried woman in a young man’s dream. Giving her perfume is evidence of the extent of the young man’s love for her and his desire to marry her. The dream of perfume in the dream of an unmarried woman, especially if its scent is pleasant and subtle, indicates that she will communicate with a young man who has good manners. However, if the smell is bad, then this dream indicates that a young man It is not appropriate for him to propose to her. Seeing perfumes in an unmarried girl’s dream can be evidence that this girl has a good reputation and biography. An Egyptian website, the largest site specialized in dream interpretation in the Arab world. Just type Egyptian Dream Interpretation Website on Google and get the correct interpretations. Interpretation of a dream about perfumes by Ibn Sirin. Interpreted by the respected scholar. Ibn Sirin Seeing perfume in a dream for an unmarried girl suffering from an illness or disease is a sign of her death and an imminent period. But seeing buying perfumes in her dream indicates that the dreamer will acquire many good things, benefits, and abundant money in the coming period. In the event that she sees the smell of saffron In a dream, this means that she will hear some happy words that will make her heart happy. Spraying Perfume Dream Interpretation for a Single Woman Seeing an unmarried woman spraying perfume in a dream is a vision that has many connotations and meanings and has been interpreted as follows: When an unmarried woman sees in her dream that A young man gives her perfume with a beautiful scent, then this dream is evidence that she will soon marry this young man, but seeing a young woman in her dream spraying a beautiful perfume on herself. It means that she will soon connect with a rich young man, and God knows best. Seeing an unmarried woman buying perfume in a dream means achieving all her hopes and goals that she always seeks in the coming period, and spraying perfume in a dream for an unmarried woman is one of the dreams that brings good news to her. Days.Dream interpretation of a gift of perfume for a single woman. When an unmarried woman sees in her dream that someone is giving her a bottle of perfume as a gift, this is evidence that this person has some feelings of affection and love towards her and wants to marry her. title: Interpretation of glasses in a dream

preview.html: We always hide our eyes when we wear glasses, but the interpretation of glasses in a dream: what is hidden behind them? Seeing glasses in a dream has many different meanings and interpretations, and it symbolizes something that is mostly hidden, and the interpretation of seeing glasses in a dream varies depending on the condition of the eye, and that is why we have explained some interpretations of seeing glasses. In a dream through the encyclopedia in the article below. Interpretation of glasses in a dream When you see someone wearing glasses in a dream and they are black in color, in this dream the dreamer must be very careful with those around him, especially those close to him, as black glasses indicate that someone knows something About the dreamer’s personal affairs. Seeing someone wearing red glasses in a dream means that this person is trying to find the solution that he lost, and if the glasses are orange, it means that the person who has the vision has ambition and vitality and that he will achieve his goal. Dreams. When a man sees that he is wearing glasses but they are not suitable for his face, the dream indicates that the dreamer sees things in a wrong way and needs to correct his point of view in his vision of things. When a man sees that his glasses are broken, this is evidence that the dreamer is living in a state of happiness. And comfort, but these blessings will soon leave. When you see someone in a dream wearing sunglasses, this is an indication that the dreamer views this person incorrectly and should look at him in a good way and improve the relationship between them. Interpretation of glasses in a dream for a married womanIf a married woman sees glasses in In a dream, this indicates that her affairs are going in order and that her married life is happy. If they are sunglasses, this indicates that her husband still finds her beautiful in his eyes and she maintains her beauty. Seeing glasses in a dream for a married woman indicates control and control and that she is an influential figure in the life of a married woman. Those around her. Seeing broken glasses is evidence of problems in her married life. If a married woman dreams of glasses and she is pregnant, the dream indicates facilitating her birth. Interpretation of glasses in a dream for a married man. If a married man sees broken glasses in a dream, the dream means that he will experience failure. In his work or lose in his project. If it is sunglasses, this indicates the presence of deceitful and deceitful people in this person’s life. Seeing expensive glasses in a dream is evidence that the owner of the vision will earn a lot of money and a lot of living doing what he seeks. Interpretation Glasses in a dream for someone. An unmarried young man who sees a woman’s glasses in a dream is evidence that he will get married soon. A single man seeing his mother’s glasses in a dream is evidence of his belief in his mother and that she will fulfill his desire. A young man who sees the glasses of the girl he loves is evidence that he will marry her soon. A single man who Seeing sunglasses in his dream is evidence that he will obtain high positions in his work. For more dream interpretation, visit the Direct Dreams application.
